mapper.sql: id as id ,chain as chain ,split as split ,token_id as token_id ,meta as meta ,body as body ,display_name as display_name ,current_supply as current_supply ,total_supply as total_supply ,support_token as support_token ,uri as uri ,description as description ,rule as rule ,max_amount as max_amount ,creator_id as creator_id ,creator_address as creator_address ,enabled as enabled ,sort as sort ,sale_time as sale_time ,end_time as end_time
